title: Should I study law or literature and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: depend on where your interests lay , if you are logical and can convey it using the right choice of words effectively , you should study law . On the contrary if you are a dreamer and would love to cook up a story or you enjoy a story when its told , Are you the one who get that wow feeling when you read a romantic poem , ??? Try literature , . Knowing your interests helps in making that choice . Literature is as important as law and A good poet gets to be more famous than a amazing lawyer. and a successfull novelist makes great money too . So dont listen to what others tell you . MAKE that choice based on what you like the most.

Nobody can answer that for you. But I can offer this suggestion: if you do study law, also study literature, or else you risk becoming exceedingly narrow. You might look a little into Cicero — a lawyer and a literary master.
